text: Muli di ngadau e dahi, di madagoaa e nnoo mau e haihai nia dauwa o nia king, David ne hagau a dana dagi dauwa aamua go Joab mo ana dagi dauwa mo digau dauwa o Israel huogodoo belee heebagi. Digaula gu haga magedaa digau Ammon, ga nomuli ga duuli di waahale go Rabbah. Gei David nogo i Jerusalem.11.1 1 Kronikel 20.1
